name: 马克·埃布鲁埃
name_full: 马克·埃布鲁埃 Mark Ebulué

last_movies.title: 激光战鹰队长：血龙 Remix

introduction: Mark Arinzechuckwu Ebulué is an Actor known for "Slingshot"(2024) "North Star" (2024) "Captain Laserhawk And The Blood Dragon Remix" (2023) and "Masters Of The Air"(2024). Mark grew up in Peckham, south London. He has attended Italia Conti Drama School graduating in 2011 and has been acting ever since. As a teenager He attended the London Nautical School.Mark is Also trained extensively in Krav Maga in fact as of 2017 Mark Ebulue was made a MMA Krav Maga Instructor (Certified By The British Combat Association) under Head Instructor Ricky Manetta
